rule: The output must focus first on the subjects of the photo and their characteristics.
input: A musician playing a guitar on a busy subway platform. The image should feel energetic and urban.
output: A young woman with vibrant blue hair, clad in ripped jeans and a band t-shirt, strums an electric guitar passionately as commuters rush past her on a crowded subway platform.  The stage lighting casts harsh shadows and illuminates the sweat glistening on her brow during the early evening commute. Background is blurred with a kaleidoscope of colorful posters advertising local events and bustling commuters holding briefcases and smartphones. The image should exude vibrant energy, capturing the electrifying pulse of urban life.
complianceText:
The output complies with the chatbot description. The text remains within the 80-word limit and is crafted into a single paragraph. The description effectively follows the sequence required: it starts with the subject (a young woman with vibrant blue hair, her clothing, and actions), then details the timing and lighting (early evening commute with stage lighting casting harsh shadows), describes the background (blurred with colorful posters and bustling commuters), and concludes with the feeling the image should evoke (vibrant energy capturing urban life).

OK
